233.movie_plot: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.

19.movie_plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

257.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

324.movie_plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

93.movie_plot: Two counterculture bikers travel from Los Angeles to New Orleans in search of America.

51.movie_plot: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

3.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

127.movie_plot: What do an elderly topiary gardener, a retired lion tamer, a man fascinated by mole rats, and a cutting-edge robotics designer have in common? Both nothing and everything in this ...

95.movie_plot: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

289.movie_plot: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

21.movie_plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

180.movie_plot: In the midst of trying to legitimize his business dealings in New York City and Italy in 1979, aging Mafia Don Michael Corleone seeks to avow for his sins, while taking his nephew Vincent Mancini under his wing.

134.movie_plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

108.movie_plot: The classic Shakespearean play about a murderously scheming king staged in an alternative fascist England setting.

124.movie_plot: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

146.movie_plot: Two minor characters from the play 'Hamlet' stumble around unaware of their scripted lives and unable to deviate from them.

54.movie_plot: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

281.movie_plot: Planet Spaceballs' President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

101.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

159.movie_plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

32.movie_plot: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

205.movie_plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

182.movie_plot: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine - the Mob - track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

267.movie_plot: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

320.movie_name: In the Name of the Father (1993)
320.movie_plot: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

310.movie_plot: James Bond heads to The Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by SPECTRE agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.

271.movie_plot: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

244.movie_plot: In order to save their home from foreclosure, a group of misfits set out to find a pirate's ancient valuable treasure.

89.movie_plot: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.

260.movie_plot: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.

218.movie_plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

242.movie_plot: A veteran policeman, Murtaugh, is partnered with a younger, suicidal officer, Riggs. They both have one thing in common: hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.

71.movie_plot: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

315.movie_plot: James Bond woos a mob boss's daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps that involves beautiful women from around the world.

323.movie_plot: James Bond goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a C.I.A. Agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

240.movie_plot: A spoof of Robin Hood in general and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

116.movie_plot: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist, while both sides attempt to find balance between their personal and their professional lives.

188.movie_plot: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for president of the USA.

166.movie_plot: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

272.movie_plot: The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.
